item.title: EDUCATION
item.description: University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign Aug 2024 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ➜ May 2026 Masters of Science (MS) in Computer Science Awards: Research Assistanship (full tuition & stipend) Aug 2021 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ➜ May 2024 Bachelor of Science (BS) in Computer Science (GPA: 3.93) Awards: 6 x James Scholar Honors, Highest Honors ADVANCED COURSEWORK Tensor Computation (CS 598) Iterative and Multigrid Methods (CS 556) Parallel Programming (CS 484) Applied Parallel Programming (CS 483) Computer Security I (CS 461) Machine Learning (CS 446) Computer Organization (CS 433) Distributed Systems (CS 425) Programming Languages (CS 421) Game Development (CS 415) Introduction to Data Science (INFO 407)

item.title: EXPERIENCE
item.description: ACADEMIC EXPERIENCE May 2023 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ➜ Present, Research Assistant SLICE Lab @ UC Berkeley Under Prof. Fletcher and Nandeeka Nayak. Utilizing a novel approach to evaluate and enhance diverse accelerators across different domains; modeling FHE schemes and existing accelerators to advance understanding of FHE workloads. May 2023 ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ➜ May 2024, Research Assistant Parallel Programming Lab Under Prof. Kale. Architecting and evaluating load balancing strategies for supercomputing clusters; integrating Charm++ into the Ray API backend to enhance ML workload performance.
